meanings.sent1: The flibbertigibbet in our class always changes her mind about what she likes.
meanings.sent2: My aunt is such a flibbertigibbet; she can never stick to one topic for long.
meanings.sent3: The flibbertigibbet at the party kept jumping from one group to another, never staying still.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a flibbertigibbet, flitting from one idea to the next without pause.
meanings.sent5: The flibbertigibbet's behavior was like a butterfly, fluttering from one thing to another.

meanings.sent1: The flibbertigibbet in the office always knows the latest news before anyone else.
meanings.sent2: She's a real flibbertigibbet, always eager to share the latest gossip with anyone who will listen.
meanings.sent3: The flibbertigibbet couldn't resist telling everyone about the secret surprise party.
meanings.sent4: Her mouth was a flibbertigibbet, spilling out secrets without a second thought.
meanings.sent5: The flibbertigibbet's words floated around the room like feathers in the wind.

meanings.sent1: His flibbertigibbet nature made it hard to predict his next move.
meanings.sent2: The cat's flibbertigibbet behavior kept the family entertained with its antics.
meanings.sent3: The flibbertigibbet of a dog ran in circles chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: The wind's flibbertigibbet dance through the trees was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent5: The flibbertigibbet of the clouds painted a constantly changing picture in the sky.
